name: GRIDD
description:
In GRIDD each player gains points every iteration.  You can use those points to move, build blocks, destroy blocks, kill players, etc. You can use your points any time, and create as big of a base you can imagine!

Use generators to create massive energy farms, and shields to protect them. Gang up with tons of your friends to storm a base. And don't forget,  more walls means better security!

Create freeform bases with no laws and rules about who owns what. The gridd is lawless. Make it your own.
